                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/DLidington" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">David Lidington</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/DLidington">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">DLidington</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Member of Parliament for Aylesbury. Chancellor of the  Duchy of Lancaster &amp; Minister for the Cabinet Office. RTs imply interest not necessarily agreement</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Aylesbury, London, Risborough 

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">  <a class="u-textUserColor" target="_blank" rel="me nofollow noopener" href="https://t.co/IxzV1QyrvY" title="http://www.davidlidington.com">
    davidlidington.com
  </a>

</span>
      </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Ed Llewellyn Retweeted UK Prime Minister</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very powerful joint statement just issued by the British Prime Minister, the French President, the German Chancellor and the President of the United States...<a href="https://t.co/qhob0wq0Gq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/10downingstreet/status/974273953731633152" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/10downingstreet/status/974273953731633152"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/10downingstree</span><span class="invisible">t/status/974273953731633152</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ed Llewellyn added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/10DowningStreet/status/974273953731633152" data-conversation-id="974273953731633152" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="974273953731633152" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="10DowningStreet" data-user-id="14224719" href="/10DowningStreet/status/974273953731633152" data-conversation-id="974273953731633152" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">UK Prime Minister</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>10DowningStreet</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">We, the leaders of France, Germany, the United States and the United Kingdom, abhor the attack that took place against Sergei and Yulia Skripal in Salisbury. Full statement: <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/salisbury-attack-joint-statement-from-the-leaders-of-france-germany-the-united-states-and-the-united-kingdom" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/salisbury-attack-joint-statement-from-the-leaders-of-france-germany-the-united-states-and-the-united-kingdom"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/salisbury-attack-joint-statement-from-the-leaders-of-france-germany-the-united-states-and-the-united-kingdom</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Strong public support for UK over <a href="/hashtag/Salisbury?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Salisbury</b></a>. </div>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/10DowningStreet" data-user-id="14224719">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="973248301113008128" id="stream-item-tweet-973248301113008128" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;973248301113008128&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

Better diagnosis, dementia research funding, helping people live independently in their homes longer &amp; tackle loneliness. See how the Govt is rising to the challenge of an ageing society w/ 300m funding <a href="https://t.co/Oia3R3avp4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-300-million-for-landmark-ageing-society-grand-challenge" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-300-million-for-landmark-ageing-society-grand-challenge"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/government-announces-300-million-for-landmark-ageing-society-grand-challenge</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/ya1sUDjC8C" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ya1sUDjC8C</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Contrast this with <a href="/jeremycorbyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></a> response<a href="https://t.co/zvJhc0Qmbr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NicolaSturgeon/status/973258874814902274" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NicolaSturgeon/status/973258874814902274"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NicolaSturgeon</span><span class="invisible">/status/973258874814902274</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Gavin Barwell added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/NicolaSturgeon/status/973258874814902274" data-conversation-id="973258874814902274" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="973258874814902274" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="NicolaSturgeon" data-user-id="160952087" href="/NicolaSturgeon/status/973258874814902274" data-conversation-id="973258874814902274" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Nicola Sturgeon</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>NicolaSturgeon</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Exactly right. Cool heads certainly required but also a firm response. Russia simply cannot be allowed to launch attacks on our streets with impunity. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/stewartmcdonald/status/973246811971444737" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/stewartmcdonald/status/973246811971444737"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/stewartmcdonal</span><span class="invisible">d/status/973246811971444737</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10; </div>


    

    

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Devolved administrations will have full control of vast majority of returning EU powers straight after we leave EU, with just 24 areas subject to further discussion on potential legislative frameworks. <a href="/DLidington" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="496278040"><s>@</s><b>DLidington</b></a>: "process has to be open and transparent"

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Raphael Hogarth</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Interesting read.<a href="https://t.co/rX8IMrAgiG" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Raphael_Hogarth/status/969513073374580736" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Raphael_Hogarth/status/969513073374580736"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Raphael_Hogart</span><span class="invisible">h/status/969513073374580736</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">1/ Here is a brief explanation of why I agree with the UK Government that the European Court of Justice (ECJ) should not be the sole tribunal competent to interpret and enforce the entire withdrawal agreement.</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Tom Tugendhat Retweeted Charlie Dewhirst</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The growth we're seeing isn't just a statistical game. It's what pays for schools, hospitals, and so much more. Our economy is the lifeblood of our society growth means the weakest and poorest have more protections paid for by the whole nation. <a href="/hashtag/GrowthMatters?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GrowthMatters</b></a><a href="https://t.co/kTqy7bzNvr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/charliedewhirst/status/969518379127267328" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/charliedewhirst/status/969518379127267328"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/charliedewhirs</span><span class="invisible">t/status/969518379127267328</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">

  <ul>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Sadness today at closure of <a href="/hashtag/Aylesbury?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Aylesbury</b></a>'s historic Crown Court coupled with welcome for the much imoroved trial &amp; worling conditions of its 21st century successor<a href="https://t.co/jwNqYvraRc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/MillySoames/status/969541080785063936" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/MillySoames/status/969541080785063936"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/MillySoames/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/969541080785063936</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

Dydd Gwyl Dewi hapus! <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f3f4-e0067-e0062-e0077-e006c-e0073-e007f.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of Wales" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of Wales" />

<a href="/DLidington" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="496278040"><s>@</s><b>DLidington</b></a> speaks about his fond memories of Wales. <a href="/hashtag/GlobalStDavids?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GlobalStDavids</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ukWJkfv8ze" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ukWJkfv8ze</a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7</span>

Just as we fought for your independence, the UK will continue to demonstrate its commitment to regional security through the deployment of EFP troops. We look forward to the next 100 years of cooperation &amp; friendship - PM</p>

She truly is an inspiration to us all.<a href="https://t.co/ys2nkKmn0M" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ys2nkKmn0M</a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="966695890684710913" id="stream-item-tweet-966695890684710913" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;966695890684710913&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="966695890684710913" data-item-id="966695890684710913" data-permalink-path="/cabinetofficeuk/status/966695890684710913" data-conversation-id="966695890684710913" data-tweet-nonce="966695890684710913-6c2e0572-3612-4603-9f02-4db89e580e3e" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="966808883984519169" data-retweeter="DLidington" data-screen-name="cabinetofficeuk" data-name="Cabinet Office" data-user-id="143478208" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="DLidington" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;143478208&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;cabinetofficeuk&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Cabinet Office&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Cabinet Office&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Cabinet Office&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;496278040&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;DLidington&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We are seeking to appoint a new Chair to help us increase participation in sport and physical activity by disabled people.
Get in touch if you are passionate about sport and physical activity and have the drive and influence to lead the charity.
<a href="https://t.co/yc3MuIFVh7" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.wheelpower.org.uk/chair" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.wheelpower.org.uk/chair"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">wheelpower.org.uk/chair</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/ZWNmofDJ8o" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ZWNmofDJ8o</a></p>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </span>

  </button>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="950370357684396032" id="stream-item-tweet-950370357684396032" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;950370357684396032&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

* the UK is the 2nd largest investor in Spain, creating 100k+ jobs

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Good that the Chancellor of the Exchequer <a href="/PhilipHammondUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2653613168"><s>@</s><b>PhilipHammondUK</b></a> is visiting Sweden. The UK is a key economic partner for us.<a href="https://t.co/hMpjNFBwaC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/philiphammonduk/status/963504572667957249" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/philiphammonduk/status/963504572667957249"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/philiphammondu</span><span class="invisible">k/status/963504572667957249</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Torbjrn Sohlstrm added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/PhilipHammondUK/status/963504572667957249" data-conversation-id="963504572667957249" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="963504572667957249" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="PhilipHammondUK" data-user-id="2653613168" href="/PhilipHammondUK/status/963504572667957249" data-conversation-id="963504572667957249" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Philip Hammond</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>PhilipHammondUK</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">We will leave the EU in March 2019, but we are not leaving Europe. 

My piece today for Swedish newspaper <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="264169218"><s>@</s><b>dagensindustri</b></span> on the UK's relationship with Sweden and the rest of the EU.

</div>
        </div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="fr" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">J'ai reu aujourd'hui M. David Lidington, ministre britannique d'tat au  Bureau du Cabinet et chancelier du duch de Lancastre pour changer au  sujet de la ncessaire coopration entre la France et le Royaume</div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Cabinet Office</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Today I announced the name of chair of the Contaminated Blood Inquiry. Look fwd to him consulting survivors &amp; starring Inquiry's work<a href="https://t.co/eYLF8C5fBA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/cabinetofficeuk/status/961598142545301505" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/cabinetofficeuk/status/961598142545301505"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/cabinetofficeu</span><span class="invisible">k/status/961598142545301505</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    </a>

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Cabinet Office</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>cabinetofficeuk</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Today <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="496278040"><s>@</s><b>DLidington</b></span> announced a Chair for the independent <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>contaminatedblood</b></span> Inquiry. 
Read more here: <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-mr-justice-langstaff-will-lead-inquiry-into-the-infected-blood-scandal" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-mr-justice-langstaff-will-lead-inquiry-into-the-infected-blood-scandal"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/government-announces-mr-justice-langstaff-will-lead-inquiry-into-the-infected-blood-scandal</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/pNfPsC21oC</span></div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="960502229223530497" id="stream-item-tweet-960502229223530497" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;960502229223530497&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

We all have a role to play to make sure the intimidation we have witnessed over the weekend is not commonplace. Tomorrow I'll outline my vision for a more tolerant and respectful United Kingdom.<a href="https://t.co/xGe1ny1MTN" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/xGe1ny1MTN</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Laura Kuenssberg</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Jacob &amp; I don't always agree but he's a staunch champion of free speech. Surely the raison d'tre of a university as of a free parliament is to exchange &amp; debate competing ideas<a href="https://t.co/BwMjXWZB5g" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbclaurak/status/959511554059325440" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbclaurak/status/959511554059325440"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbclaurak/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/959511554059325440</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Martin Anthony Tett Retweeted BTVLEP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Mostly local road projects. Congratulations to <a href="/buckscc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="219407970"><s>@</s><b>buckscc</b></a> Highways team and local District colleagues. Good teamwork. Important to give praise to all involved.<a href="https://t.co/y8ZWYCT6el" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/btvlep/status/959086780405383169" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/btvlep/status/959086780405383169"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/btvlep/status/</span><span class="invisible">959086780405383169</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Martin Anthony Tett added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/BTVLEP/status/959086780405383169" data-conversation-id="959086780405383169" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="959086780405383169" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="BTVLEP" data-user-id="575449420" href="/BTVLEP/status/959086780405383169" data-conversation-id="959086780405383169" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">BTVLEP</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>BTVLEP</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">33 million secured for Buckinghamshire area for Housing Infrastructure Projects in Aylesbury, Princes Risborough, Beaconsfield and High Wycombe. Congratulations to all of our local authority partners involved in the successful bids <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/866-million-investment-to-help-unlock-potential-200000-new-homes" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/866-million-investment-to-help-unlock-potential-200000-new-homes"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/866-million-investment-to-help-unlock-potential-200000-new-homes</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Sir Jeremy Heywood</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Glad that civil service leaders are committed to removing stigma from mental health at work<a href="https://t.co/3Lv1jCx27Z" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HeadUKCivServ/status/959100205575626752" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HeadUKCivServ/status/959100205575626752"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HeadUKCivServ/</span><span class="invisible">status/959100205575626752</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/HeadUKCivServ/status/959100205575626752" data-conversation-id="959100205575626752" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="959100205575626752" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="HeadUKCivServ" data-user-id="3110800479" href="/HeadUKCivServ/status/959100205575626752" data-conversation-id="959100205575626752" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Sir Jeremy Heywood</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>HeadUKCivServ</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">My aim is that as employers, managers &amp; colleagues we will become increasingly confident in the way we talk about, help break down stigma around, &amp; show support to those with mental ill health. CS <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>MentalHealth</b></span> Champion <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="912596455659106304"><s>@</s><b>PermSecGLD</b></span> writes on <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TimetoTalk</b></span> </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Dominic Raab Retweeted Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Govt</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Delighted to announce targeted investment to get up to 200,000 new homes built - by investing in local roads, schools &amp; clinics so we build more homes, but also stronger communities.<a href="https://t.co/ge7cw45j2e" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/mhclg/status/959114696619118595" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/mhclg/status/959114696619118595"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/mhclg/status/9</span><span class="invisible">59114696619118595</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations to my friend and old colleague <a href="/Dunja_Mijatovic" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1153507362"><s>@</s><b>Dunja_Mijatovic</b></a>, a formidable champion of media freedom &amp; human rights<a href="https://t.co/jXflEeKwm2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SianCMacLeod/status/956215676796104704" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SianCMacLeod/status/956215676796104704"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SianCMacLeod/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/956215676796104704</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">From today we're banning hidden charges for paying with your credit or debit card - a move that will help millions of people avoid rip-off fees when spending their hard-earned money.<a href="https://t.co/EEk5jxdk7R" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/EEk5jxdk7R</a></p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

Not just birthplace of the Paralympics but pioneering new therapies and tech to treat spinal cord injuries today and in the future. <a href="https://t.co/Hwzk4cyilD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2AM93ei" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2AM93ei"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2AM93ei</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Another great story of an employer giving ex-prisoner successful 2nd chance. Hope many more follow <a href="/TimpFoundation" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="929990825978843136"><s>@</s><b>TimpFoundation</b></a> example in 2018. <a href="/JamesTCobbler" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="700623490"><s>@</s><b>JamesTCobbler</b></a><a href="https://t.co/8tk4W0Ik73" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/TimpFoundation/status/946701098919825410" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/TimpFoundation/status/946701098919825410"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/TimpFoundation</span><span class="invisible">/status/946701098919825410</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Timpson Foundation</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>TimpFoundation</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">James Timpson started employing former prisoners 10 years ago. "I was invited to go round Thorncross in Warrington," he says. "They gave me a guide, Matthew, who I really liked him. So I said 'when you're out I'll</div>
        </div>
      </div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">58</span>
  </span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This door in Westminster Abbey dates from around the time of its consecration, nearly 1000 yrs ago. That means the oak could have been a sapling when the Romans marched out of Britain. 
Is it the oldest working door in the UK?<a href="https://t.co/0L1rUW32sC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/0L1rUW32sC</a></p>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="7856">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7.9K</span>
  </span>

  </button>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/AnthonySeldon" data-user-id="349006737">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/758764964853186564/h7oFPBFB_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Sir Anthony Seldon</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>AnthonySeldon</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Free speech within the law is the only sensible stand for universities. Suppression encourages the tyranny of the minority, and group think. Even if views are wrong-headed, foolish, politically motivated or evil. <a href="/JoJohnsonUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="237700394"><s>@</s><b>JoJohnsonUK</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/FreeSpeech?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FreeSpeech</b></a></p>
</div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Weird thing to do on Christmas Eve but Id encourage everyone to take a moment to imagine losing the person you love most in the world. Imagine what you would wish you had said to them. Then take a moment to say it.</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Xmas can be a difficult time for many. If you're feeling down, speak to a friend or family member, or an organisation like <a href="/samaritans" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="404248209"><s>@</s><b>samaritans</b></a> or <a href="/CE_Mind" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2849910857"><s>@</s><b>CE_Mind</b></a> for support. And please reach out to neighbours who might be lonely <a href="/hashtag/mentalhealth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mentalhealth</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/loneliness?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>loneliness</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/StayWellThisWinter?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StayWellThisWinter</b></a> <a href="/JoCoxLoneliness" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="821010896063463426"><s>@</s><b>JoCoxLoneliness</b></a></p>
</div>

PC Gareth Browning, PC Simon Caddy &amp; PC James Dixon

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--favorite u-hiddenVisually">

  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very strong use of social media to get the truth out from <a href="/DavidGauke" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2230539338"><s>@</s><b>DavidGauke</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/UncorktheGauke?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UncorktheGauke</b></a><a href="https://t.co/py8qSNnZsr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/davidgauke/status/943406844814520320" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/davidgauke/status/943406844814520320"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/davidgauke/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/943406844814520320</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">David Gauke</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>DavidGauke</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Here's my letter to Frank Field. We only found who Frank was tweeting about on Tuesday. By which time, 688 had already been paid in UC. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/vdjTqn86aD</span></div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="942097791668584448" id="stream-item-tweet-942097791668584448" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;942097791668584448&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="942097791668584448" data-item-id="942097791668584448" data-permalink-path="/alstewitn/status/942097791668584448" data-conversation-id="942097791668584448" data-tweet-nonce="942097791668584448-676bf3d5-524b-43ca-8cf0-713bb29042ec" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="942102980874162176" data-retweeter="DLidington" data-screen-name="alstewitn" data-name="Alastair Stewart" data-user-id="267348157" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="Twitter LindsayHoyle_MP" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;267348157&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;alstewitn&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Alastair Stewart&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Alastair Stewart&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Alastair Stewart&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;496278040&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;DLidington&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;783214&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Twitter&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Twitter&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Twitter&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Twitter&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;609096352&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LindsayHoyle_MP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Lindsay Hoyle&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Lindsay Hoyle&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Lindsay Hoyle&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I was proud to show the UK's Lord Chancellor just two of the entrepreneurial businesses on the Island with visits to Swagelock and <a href="/iomcreamery" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="360763670"><s>@</s><b>iomcreamery</b></a> this morning <a href="/hashtag/IsleofMan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IsleofMan</b></a> <a href="/MoJGovUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="40015678"><s>@</s><b>MoJGovUK</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ES5ceE2vA3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ES5ceE2vA3</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Good to learn from First Deemster about Manx justice system &amp; IOM's ancient traditions if rule of law &amp; judicial independence<a href="https://t.co/6wGEI0l7iY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/IOMGovernment/status/941649433338568705" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/IOMGovernment/status/941649433338568705"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/IOMGovernment/</span><span class="invisible">status/941649433338568705</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Howard Quayle</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Delighted to make my first visit as Lord Chancellor to Isle of Man. Thank you <a href="/HowardQuayleMHK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="832525725655777280"><s>@</s><b>HowardQuayleMHK</b></a> for yr hospitality<a href="https://t.co/1rKaLxo50H" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HowardQuayleMHK/status/941623573378105344" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HowardQuayleMHK/status/941623573378105344"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HowardQuayleMH</span><span class="invisible">K/status/941623573378105344</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/HowardQuayleMHK/status/941623573378105344" data-conversation-id="941623573378105344" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="941623573378105344" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="HowardQuayleMHK" data-user-id="832525725655777280" href="/HowardQuayleMHK/status/941623573378105344" data-conversation-id="941623573378105344" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRFRDJOXUAAhOqN.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,33,18,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,33,18]">

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Howard Quayle</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>HowardQuayleMHK</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">A pleasure to welcome the UK's Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice the Rt Hon David Lidington MP to the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IsleofMan</b></span> - looking forward to a productive day of talks and visits <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="40015678"><s>@</s><b>MoJGovUK</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/j31gyBg8Vt</span></div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">99 years ago today British ships arrived to support Estonias fight for independence. A moving ceremony honoured the British sailors who died (and the weather was a reminder of how grim it must have been in 1918)<a href="https://t.co/HE8A5csbif" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/HE8A5csbif</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We are pleased to let you know that we have been able to reschedule <a href="/hashtag/Carolfest?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Carolfest</b></a> for this Friday 15 Dec <a href="/aylesburystmary" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="849021763"><s>@</s><b>aylesburystmary</b></a> from 6-7pm. We hope you can join us for this popular Community Carol singing event. With <a href="/dezkay1" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="802909548"><s>@</s><b>dezkay1</b></a>, The Wingrave Singers and Kenton on the piano.<a href="https://t.co/Ax3D7tOvcc" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Ax3D7tOvcc</a></p>

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-singlePhoto" style="padding-top: calc(1.4143646408839778 * 100% - 0.5px);">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/DLidington" data-user-id="496278040">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/972153399465652224/UdTF5tId_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">David Lidington</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>DLidington</b></span></a>

Not bothered about the cash in there, just got the last pic of me and my late grandad in it. <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks to <a href="/buckscc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="219407970"><s>@</s><b>buckscc</b></a> workers + contractors' staff who've been out salting over weekend<a href="https://t.co/HMf5C5tZi0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tfbalerts/status/939905599084597255" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tfbalerts/status/939905599084597255"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tfbalerts/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/939905599084597255</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Over the last 24 hours TfB has spread approximately 850 tonnes of salt over 7000km of road. 65 staff members have been working through the night and all day - read more below. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>readyforwinter</b></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Puttingsafetyfirst</b></span> </div>

Ploughs fitted in south with preparation for snow route activities only.
Decision for north will be updated mid morning.
Further updates during day</p>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Youth Concern Retweeted Mix96</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">We are absolutely delighted to have received a grant for 310K over 3 years from the Big Lottery Foundation Reaching Communities Programme. This will go a long way to funding our lifeline services for " at risk" young people over the next 3 years.
Thank you <a href="/officialmix96" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="82047294"><s>@</s><b>officialmix96</b></a>!<a href="https://t.co/FZz1blpvoR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/officialmix96/status/939136798227357696" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/officialmix96/status/939136798227357696"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/officialmix96/</span><span class="invisible">status/939136798227357696</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Youth Concern added,</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Beavers being returned to the Forest of Dean. <a href="/michaelgove" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="748453510048518145"><s>@</s><b>michaelgove</b></a> reversing decades of zoophobia . Very exciting.<a href="https://t.co/cmXd4Dt5q2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/beavers-returned-to-forest-of-dean-as-solution-to-flooding-fw5s3jsmx" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/beavers-returned-to-forest-of-dean-as-solution-to-flooding-fw5s3jsmx"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">thetimes.co.uk/article/beaver</span><span class="invisible">s-returned-to-forest-of-dean-as-solution-to-flooding-fw5s3jsmx</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">There are some great ideas for garden town planning already happening in Aylesbury - Welcome to Kingsbrook, Britain's most wildlife-friendly housing development <a href="https://t.co/K8jvq23s9y" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.telegraph.co.uk/science/2017/11/12/welcome-kingsbrook-britains-wildlife-friendly-housing-development/?WT.mc_id=tmg_share_tw" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.telegraph.co.uk/science/2017/11/12/welcome-kingsbrook-britains-wildlife-friendly-housing-development/?WT.mc_id=tmg_share_tw"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">telegraph.co.uk/science/2017/1</span><span class="invisible">1/12/welcome-kingsbrook-britains-wildlife-friendly-housing-development/?WT.mc_id=tmg_share_tw</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> via <a href="/TelegraphSci" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19657855"><s>@</s><b>TelegraphSci</b></a></p>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">UK govt against US decision to move embassy to Jerusalem - unhelpful for prospects of peace in the region.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Important that residents in <a href="/hashtag/Aylesbury?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Aylesbury</b></a>, Wendover, Weston Turville, Stoke Mandeville have their say before deadline<a href="https://t.co/TXaMkUcnGr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/aylesburyvale/status/937710305936838657" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/aylesburyvale/status/937710305936838657"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/aylesburyvale/</span><span class="invisible">status/937710305936838657</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A priest &amp; an Imam walk into a school - lead an assembly together - lead a prayer together - visit classes together -  two friends from <a href="/hashtag/Batley?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Batley</b></a> visited Hanging Heaton <a href="/c_of_e" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19980947"><s>@</s><b>c_of_e</b></a> Primary School - wonderful questions and welcome...

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Speaking on future of countryside at <a href="/hashtag/BRAG?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BRAG</b></a> conference at Gt Kingshill. <a href="/CommunityBucks" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117046026"><s>@</s><b>CommunityBucks</b></a><a href="https://t.co/YuoL5P9HwH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CllrWarrenWhyte/status/934004865533186049" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CllrWarrenWhyte/status/934004865533186049"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CllrWarrenWhyt</span><span class="invisible">e/status/934004865533186049</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">The Week UK</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>TheWeekUK</b></span>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Simon Hoare MP Retweeted Carrie Symonds</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">When its tax payers money I rather do think you need a number!<a href="https://t.co/cVtwTyKLg8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/carriesymonds/status/932207288059940865" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/carriesymonds/status/932207288059940865"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/carriesymonds/</span><span class="invisible">status/932207288059940865</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Simon Hoare MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Hammond is, however, quite right to say that the Tory record on unemployment has been extraordinary....<a href="https://t.co/DcjIOiPeEf" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/DcjIOiPeEf</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Alan Sherwell</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">And several of the air cadets in the march past wore <a href="/RoyalAirForce" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="92943533"><s>@</s><b>RoyalAirForce</b></a> light blue hijabs. <a href="/hashtag/UnityinDiversity?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UnityinDiversity</b></a><a href="https://t.co/dy6I7hHYhD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/alansherwell/status/929836462228606976" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/alansherwell/status/929836462228606976"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/alansherwell/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/929836462228606976</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/alansherwell/status/929836462228606976" data-conversation-id="929710168534933504" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="929836462228606976" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="alansherwell" data-user-id="2946157493" href="/alansherwell/status/929836462228606976" data-conversation-id="929710168534933504" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Alan Sherwell</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>alansherwell</b></span>
  </div>

          
            <div class="ReplyingToContextBelowAuthor" data-aria-label-part="">
    Replying to <span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Big__Kev</b></span>



</div>

          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">There were Muslims "on parade" in Market Square today and 2.5 mllion fought with us in WW1 and many in WW2</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </li>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      

        <div class="ReplyingToContextBelowAuthor" data-aria-label-part="">

    Replying to <a class="pretty-link js-user-profile-link" href="/DanielJHannan" data-user-id="85794542" rel="noopener" dir="ltr"><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>DanielJHannan</b></span></a> <a class="pretty-link js-user-profile-link" href="/IBTimesUK" data-user-id="47916714" rel="noopener" dir="ltr"><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>IBTimesUK</b></span></a>


</div>


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This is a truly humbling initiative. Try typing in your surname - or, if youre male, your full name - count the matches, and feel the tragedy grab you in the stomach.<a href="https://t.co/uEfc4sCRDx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.everyoneremembered.org" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.everyoneremembered.org"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">everyoneremembered.org</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/SianCMacLeod" data-user-id="3302921447">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Sian MacLeod</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>SianCMacLeod</b></span></a>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today we celebrate the fall of the Berlin Wall.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">HMP YOI Bronzefield Retweeted Tooting WI</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Did you know that we have our own branch of the <a href="/WomensInstitute" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25268484"><s>@</s><b>WomensInstitute</b></a> providing women with a valuable connection to a community organisation in prison and on release<a href="https://t.co/dxsXUERGTi" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/TootingWI/status/928229297441202176" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/TootingWI/status/928229297441202176"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/TootingWI/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/928229297441202176</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">HMP YOI Bronzefield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/TootingWI/status/928229297441202176" data-conversation-id="928229297441202176" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">This morning we spent a wonderful time with <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="724302184041603072"><s>@</s><b>surreyfedwi</b></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="838337075950800896"><s>@</s><b>HMP_Bronzefield</b></span> for Bronzefield Bees WI coffee morning!           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Mayor of London</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Constructive talks today with <a href="/MayorofLondon" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14700117"><s>@</s><b>MayorofLondon</b></a> on how to reduce offending &amp; improve London's criminal justice system. Look fwd to working together.<a href="https://t.co/mHaDLZeLWj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/MayorofLondon/status/928292238874071042" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/MayorofLondon/status/928292238874071042"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/MayorofLondon/</span><span class="invisible">status/928292238874071042</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/MayorofLondon/status/928292238874071042" data-conversation-id="928292238874071042" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="928292238874071042" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="MayorofLondon" data-user-id="14700117" href="/MayorofLondon/status/928292238874071042" data-conversation-id="928292238874071042" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOH0mjCWsAEZ6GE.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,53,41,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,53,41]">

      </div>
  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Mayor of London</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>MayorofLondon</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">London's criminal justice system must improve if we're to get better outcomes for victims and reduce reoffending. Pleased to be working with Lord Chancellor <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="496278040"><s>@</s><b>DLidington</b></span> on delivering this for Londoners. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/XuooAOSRFB</span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Public Engagement Officer at History of Parliament <a href="https://t.co/kXIlaN71uy" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.jobs.ac.uk/job/BFK715/public-engagement-officer/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.jobs.ac.uk/job/BFK715/public-engagement-officer/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">jobs.ac.uk/job/BFK715/pub</span><span class="invisible">lic-engagement-officer/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <a href="/hashtag/twitterstorians?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>twitterstorians</b></a></p>
