<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thought-provoking discussions. Important chance for politics, business &amp; academe to test ideas &amp; good to see old friends from Spain<a href="https://t.co/WPktuoOwn5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CWilsonFCO/status/927169376054366208" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CWilsonFCO/status/927169376054366208"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CWilsonFCO/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/927169376054366208</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">18</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  </button>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Daniel Finkelstein Retweeted Paul Mason</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Just to be clear what it meant to my family. The confiscation of their property, years in hard labour camp for my grandfather, exile to the edges of Siberia for my Dad (aged 10) and my grandmother. Never going home again. All this happened because of October 1917.<a href="https://t.co/bG2sv7vVXW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/paulmasonnews/status/925088734277750785" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/paulmasonnews/status/925088734277750785"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/paulmasonnews/</span><span class="invisible">status/925088734277750785</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Daniel Finkelstein added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/paulmasonnews/status/925088734277750785" data-conversation-id="925088734277750785" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="925088734277750785" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="paulmasonnews" data-user-id="19811190" href="/paulmasonnews/status/925088734277750785" data-conversation-id="925088734277750785" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

  </span>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">10</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted parkrun UK</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">A good initiative by the governor. Prison staff are often the strongest champions of effective rehabilitation<a href="https://t.co/wh7o5YlkEg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/parkrunUK/status/925453584279404545" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/parkrunUK/status/925453584279404545"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/parkrunUK/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/925453584279404545</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">15</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Florence Nightingale</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great annual event. <a href="/SwanSupping" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="35183151"><s>@</s><b>SwanSupping</b></a> in aid of <a href="/fnhospice" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="611643559"><s>@</s><b>fnhospice</b></a>. This year <a href="/SirHenryFloyd" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1947093402"><s>@</s><b>SirHenryFloyd</b></a> . Choice of ales &amp; ciders to help our local hospice.<a href="https://t.co/9HpmXmB2aI" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/fnhospice/status/923965659809280000" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/fnhospice/status/923965659809280000"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/fnhospice/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/923965659809280000</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/TheLawSociety" data-user-id="117060803">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/884319132086415360/MIpTd0Iq_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">The Law Society</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>TheLawSociety</b></span></a>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="915834685841911808" data-item-id="915834685841911808" data-permalink-path="/DLidington/status/915834685841911808" data-conversation-id="915834685841911808" data-tweet-nonce="915834685841911808-9b05fff4-8f92-413b-b74d-8e24f636aab1" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="DLidington" data-name="David Lidington" data-user-id="496278040" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="UKPatchwork" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;496278040&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;DLidington&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;David Lidington&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1597669326&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;UKPatchwork&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Patchwork Foundation&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Patchwork Foundation&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Patchwork Foundation&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted Patchwork Foundation</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Each time I meet <a href="/hashtag/Patchworkers?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Patchworkers</b></a> I'm bowled over by their enthusiasm for politics as a way to make a difference. <a href="/UKPatchwork" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1597669326"><s>@</s><b>UKPatchwork</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/GetInvolved?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GetInvolved</b></a><a href="https://t.co/OpnQsk8ECA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ukpatchwork/status/915718848795566080" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ukpatchwork/status/915718848795566080"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ukpatchwork/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/915718848795566080</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Lidington added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

    </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"When people ask me why I put myself through it...I tell them this: I do it to root out injustice and give everyone in our country a voice"</p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kevin Foster Retweeted UK Supreme Court</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">For the first time in UK history the heads of the judiciary, govt &amp; state are all female.<a href="https://t.co/ovQJcoPDjq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKSupremeCourt/status/914810407939973120" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKSupremeCourt/status/914810407939973120"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKSupremeCourt</span><span class="invisible">/status/914810407939973120</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kevin Foster added,</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Lady Hale has today made history becoming the first ever
woman President of the Supreme Court. Watch her being sworn in <a href="/hashtag/makinghistory?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>makinghistory</b></a><a href="https://t.co/zFlbF2o6dJ" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/zFlbF2o6dJ</a></p>
</div>

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        " data-autoplaying-media="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">There are judges and officials from many courts at today's <a href="/hashtag/JudgesService?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>JudgesService</b></a>.<a href="https://t.co/NjjeIQcdXp" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/NjjeIQcdXp</a><span class="tweet-poi-geo-text">  At <a href="/search?q=place%3A0952afbd13162000" class="js-nav u-textUserColorHover js-geo-pivot-link" data-nav="search" data-place-id="0952afbd13162000">Westminster Abbey</a></span></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-quadPhoto">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Lidington Retweeted UK Supreme Court</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Delighted to attend swearing-in of new <a href="/UKSupremeCourt" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="384388286"><s>@</s><b>UKSupremeCourt</b></a> justices. A historic event as Lady Hale becomes its first woman president<a href="https://t.co/sbrkmGeHLg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKSupremeCourt/status/914745950882713600" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKSupremeCourt/status/914745950882713600"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKSupremeCourt</span><span class="invisible">/status/914745950882713600</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>
